mapper.select: SELECT PRJT_ID ,BKUP_ID ,GRP_TYCD ,GRP_TYMM ,GRID_COLM_NM1 ,GRID_COLM_NM2 ,GRID_COLM_NM3 ,GRID_COLM_NM4 ,GRID_COLM_NM5 ,GRID_COLM_NM6 ,GRID_COLM_NM7 ,GRID_COLM_NM8 ,GRID_COLM_NM9 ,GRID_COLM_NM10 ,GRID_COLM_NM11 ,GRID_COLM_NM12 ,GRID_COLM_NM13 ,GRID_COLM_NM14 ,GRID_COLM_NM15 ,GRID_COLM_NM16 ,GRID_COLM_NM17 ,GRID_COLM_NM18 ,GRID_COLM_NM19 ,GRID_COLM_NM20 ,SORT_SEQ ,USG_YN FROM pms_cd_mng WHERE 1 = 1 AND BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} ORDER BY SORT_SEQ

SELECT PRJT_ID ,BKUP_ID ,GRP_TYCD ,DTLS_TYCD ,DTLS_TYNM ,ETC_TXT1 ,ETC_TXT2 ,ETC_TXT3 ,ETC_TXT4 ,ETC_TXT5 ,ETC_TXT6 ,ETC_TXT7 ,ETC_TXT8 ,ETC_TXT9 ,ETC_TXT10 ,DTL_TXT1 ,DTL_TXT2 ,DTL_TXT3 ,DTL_TXT4 ,DTL_TXT5 ,DTL_TXT6 ,DTL_TXT7 ,DTL_TXT8 ,DTL_TXT9 ,DTL_TXT10 ,SORT_SEQ ,USE_YN FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE 1 = 1 AND BKUP_ID = #{bkup_id} AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND GRP_TYCD = #{grp_tycd} ORDER BY SORT_SEQ
SELECT PRJT_ID ,NVL2(DATE,STR_TO_DATE(DATE , '%Y%m%d'),'') AS DATE ,DATE_CD ,HOLIDAY_CD FROM pms_holiday_mng WHERE DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{sel_yyyymmdd},'%') AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pms_holiday_mng WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{new_yyyy},'%') AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}
DELETE FROM pms_holiday_mng WHERE 1 = 1 AND DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{sel_yyyymmdd},'%') AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}
mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H') AS NEW_BKUP_ID ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d:%H') AS NEW_BKUP_NM FROM DUAL
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE 1 = 1 AND DTLS_TYCD = #{new_bkup_id} AND GRP_TYCD = '1000000027' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND BKUP_ID = '0000000000'
mapper.insert:
SELECT MAX(SORT_SEQ)+1 FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE GRP_TYCD = '1000000027' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id} AND BKUP_ID = '0000000000'
INSERT INTO pms_cd_del_mng ( BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,GRP_TYCD ,DTLS_TYCD ,DTLS_TYNM ,ETC_TXT1 ,ETC_TXT2 ,ETC_TXT3 ,ETC_TXT4 ,ETC_TXT5 ,ETC_TXT6 ,ETC_TXT7 ,ETC_TXT8 ,ETC_TXT9 ,ETC_TXT10 ,DTL_TXT1 ,DTL_TXT2 ,DTL_TXT3 ,DTL_TXT4 ,DTL_TXT5 ,DTL_TXT6 ,DTL_TXT7 ,DTL_TXT8 ,DTL_TXT9 ,DTL_TXT10 ,SORT_SEQ ,USE_YN ,OPR_NO ,DB_CHG_TS ) VALUES ( '0000000000' , #{prjt_id} /*프로젝트ID*/ , '1000000027' , #{new_bkup_id} , #{new_bkup_nm} , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , '' , #{sort_seq} , 'Y' , #{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ )

INSERT INTO pms_atfl_mng SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,ATFL_MNG_ID ,FILE_RGS_DSCD ,SQNO ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_NM ,ORG_FILE_NM ,RMRMK ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_atfl_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_cd_del_mng SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,GRP_TYCD ,DTLS_TYCD ,DTLS_TYNM ,ETC_TXT1 ,ETC_TXT2 ,ETC_TXT3 ,ETC_TXT4 ,ETC_TXT5 ,ETC_TXT6 ,ETC_TXT7 ,ETC_TXT8 ,ETC_TXT9 ,ETC_TXT10 ,DTL_TXT1 ,DTL_TXT2 ,DTL_TXT3 ,DTL_TXT4 ,DTL_TXT5 ,DTL_TXT6 ,DTL_TXT7 ,DTL_TXT8 ,DTL_TXT9 ,DTL_TXT10 ,SORT_SEQ ,USE_YN ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_cd_mng SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,GRP_TYCD ,GRP_TYMM ,GRID_COLM_NM1 ,GRID_COLM_NM2 ,GRID_COLM_NM3 ,GRID_COLM_NM4 ,GRID_COLM_NM5 ,GRID_COLM_NM6 ,GRID_COLM_NM7 ,GRID_COLM_NM8 ,GRID_COLM_NM9 ,GRID_COLM_NM10 ,GRID_COLM_NM11 ,GRID_COLM_NM12 ,GRID_COLM_NM13 ,GRID_COLM_NM14 ,GRID_COLM_NM15 ,GRID_COLM_NM16 ,GRID_COLM_NM17 ,GRID_COLM_NM18 ,GRID_COLM_NM19 ,GRID_COLM_NM20 ,SORT_SEQ ,USG_YN ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_cd_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_chck SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,BZCD ,FILE_CD ,SQNO ,COLM01 ,COLM02 ,COLM03 ,COLM04 ,COLM05 ,COLM06 ,COLM07 ,COLM08 ,COLM09 ,COLM10 ,COLM11 ,COLM12 ,COLM13 ,COLM14 ,COLM15 ,COLM16 ,COLM17 ,COLM18 ,COLM19 ,COLM20 FROM pms_chck WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_emp_info SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,EMPNO ,EMPNM ,RANK_NM ,LGN_PWD ,BZCD ,CATN_DCD ,AUT_CD ,REAL_PRJT_ID ,DEPT_CD ,DEL_YN ,INP_DT ,WTH_DT ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_emp_info WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_err_mng SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,MNG_ID ,BZCD ,RGS_DSCD ,ERR_TYCD ,ERR_TXT ,RGS_DT ,RGPE_NO ,DVLPE_NO ,PL_NO ,TTMN_SCD_DT ,TTMN_DT ,TTMN_TXT ,ERR_PRC_STEP_CD ,BFJR_BZCD ,RMRK ,CCTN_BZCD ,CCTN_ID ,CCTN_SQN_CD ,RGS_ATFL_MNG_ID ,TTMN_ATFL_MNG_ID ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_err_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_iss_risk_mng SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,MNG_ID ,RGS_DIS_CD ,TITL_NM ,REQ_DIS_TXT ,REQ_DIS_CD ,RGS_DT ,ACHI_NM ,PRC_STEP_CD ,TGT_BIZ_NM ,TTMN_CRPE_NM ,TTMN_SCD_DT ,TTMN_DT ,TTMN_TXT ,SLV_MPLN_TXT ,IFNC_CD ,GD_TXT ,URGN_CD ,RMRK ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_iss_risk_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_pgm_mng SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,BZCD ,PGM_ID ,BZ_DTLS_TXT ,PGM_NM ,DVLP_DIS_CD ,PGM_DIS_CD ,ENLPE_NM ,FRCS_STA_DT ,FRCS_END_DT ,STA_DT ,END_DT ,PRC_STEP_CD ,PRG_TXT ,DVLPE_NO ,DVLPE_CNF_DT ,PL_NO ,PL_CNF_DT ,CRPE_NO ,ATFL_MNG_ID ,PAL_ATFL_MNG_ID ,RQU_SBH_ID ,RMRK ,CNV_BS_DT ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_pgm_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_rq_mng SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,MNG_ID ,BZCD ,REQ_DSCD ,REQPE_NO ,REQ_DT ,REQ_TXT ,PRCPE_NO ,PRC_DT ,PRC_TXT ,REQ_PRC_STEP_CD ,ATFL_MNG_ID ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_rq_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_week_rpt_mng SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,REAL_PRJT_ID ,WEEK_YYMM ,WEEK_SQN_CD ,DEPT_CD ,PM_NO ,ALL_REAL_PRG ,ALL_PRED_PRG ,STEP_NM ,STEP_REAL_PRG ,STEP_PRED_PRG ,PRG_TXT ,ISS_TXT ,REQ_TXT ,ATFL_MNG_ID ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_week_rpt_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_blt_brd_mng SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,GESIPAN_ID ,BUBUN_CD ,GESIPAN_TITL ,GESIPAN_DSC ,BSN_CLS_CD ,ANNYM_YN ,AFRM_YN ,CMNT_YN ,RPLY_YN ,GOOD_YN ,NMB_INQ_YN ,PGN_YN ,FILE_UPLD_YN ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_blt_brd_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_cmnt_lst SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,POST_ID ,CMNT_NO ,PRN_CMNT_CD ,CMNT_TITL ,TXT_PSW ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_cmnt_lst WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_cpy_his_lst SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,MAN_NO ,SQNO ,COMPANY_NM ,ENTER_DT ,RSNT_DT ,RSSB_BNS ,RMRK ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_cpy_his_lst WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_kanban_mng SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,DEPT_CD ,MNG_ID ,WORK_TASK ,WORK_STEP_CD ,REG_NM ,REG_DT ,COM_RGS_DT ,CRPE_NM ,PTCP_NM ,COM_DUE_DT ,STOP_DT ,RE_STA_DT ,COM_DT ,BAK_WORK_ID ,CON_WORK_ID ,RMRK ,MARK ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_kanban_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_man_pfle_info SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,MAN_NO ,BIRTHDAY ,RANK_NM ,ENTER_YMD ,MAN_CD ,CPNO ,COMPANY_NM ,ADDRESS ,SEX_NM ,SKILL_GRD ,CAREER ,MAIN_SKILL ,DUTY_TXT ,GRD_CD ,NXT_PRJ_NM ,RMRK ,SCHOLL_NM1 ,GDT_YM1 ,STUDY1 ,SCHOLL_NM2 ,GDT_YM2 ,STUDY2 ,SCHOLL_NM3 ,GDT_YM3 ,STUDY3 ,QLFKS_NM1 ,AQU_YMM1 ,QLFKS_NM2 ,AQU_YMM2 ,QLFKS_NM3 ,AQU_YMM3 ,QLFKS_NM4 ,AQU_YMM4 ,QLFKS_NM5 ,AQU_YMM5 ,ATFL_MNG_ID ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_man_pfle_info WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_mtng_room_mng SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,MTNG_ROOM_ID ,SQNO ,RSR_NO ,RSR_DT ,RSRV_STRT ,RSRV_ENDT ,MTNG_TTL ,ATFL_MNG_ID ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_mtng_room_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_post_info SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,POST_ID ,GESIPAN_ID ,POST_TITL ,POST_DSC ,VIEW_CNT ,TXT_PSW ,ATFL_MNG_ID ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_post_info WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_rpl_lst SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,POST_ID ,RPL_NO ,RPL_TITL ,GOOD_CD ,TXT_PSW ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_rpl_lst WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_prj_prs_rqs SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,REAL_PRJT_ID ,SQNO ,SCH_ENT_DT ,SKILL_GRD ,MAIN_SKILL ,DUTY_TXT ,OTH_CNT ,NMBR_RCRT ,APLC_DTLS ,REQPE_NO ,DEL_YN ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_prj_prs_rqs WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_prj_prs_sch SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,EMPNO ,SQNO ,STA_DT ,END_DT ,SCH_CNT ,DEL_YN ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_prj_prs_sch WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_inp_mnp_stt SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,EMPNO ,ENT_DT ,INP_PRJ_NM ,INP_DT ,WTH_DT ,PRJ_TYP_NM ,PRF_AR ,RMRK ,INP_CLS_CD ,WTH_SCH_YN ,DEPT_CD ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_inp_mnp_stt WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_as_to_map SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,AS_PGM_ID ,AS_PGM_DIS_CD ,AS_PGM_NM ,TO_PGM_ID ,TO_PGM_NM ,USE_PGM_TXT ,DVLPE_NO ,TRN_STT_CD ,STA_DT ,END_DT ,RMRK ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_as_to_map WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_mnts_mng SELECT #{new_bkup_id} AS BKUP_ID ,PRJT_ID ,MNG_ID ,CNF_WEK ,MTN_DT ,MTN_TM ,MTN_PLC ,ATHR_NO ,MTN_DTL ,MTN_RSL ,RQS_DTL ,ATND_DTL ,ATFL_MNG_ID ,PRC_STEP_CD ,DEL_YN ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_mnts_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{prjt_id}

INSERT INTO pms_cd_mng SELECT BKUP_ID ,#{new_prjt_id} AS PRJT_ID ,GRP_TYCD ,GRP_TYMM ,GRID_COLM_NM1 ,GRID_COLM_NM2 ,GRID_COLM_NM3 ,GRID_COLM_NM4 ,GRID_COLM_NM5 ,GRID_COLM_NM6 ,GRID_COLM_NM7 ,GRID_COLM_NM8 ,GRID_COLM_NM9 ,GRID_COLM_NM10 ,GRID_COLM_NM11 ,GRID_COLM_NM12 ,GRID_COLM_NM13 ,GRID_COLM_NM14 ,GRID_COLM_NM15 ,GRID_COLM_NM16 ,GRID_COLM_NM17 ,GRID_COLM_NM18 ,GRID_COLM_NM19 ,GRID_COLM_NM20 ,SORT_SEQ ,USG_YN ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_cd_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = '0000000000' AND GRP_TYCD != '0000000000'

INSERT INTO pms_cd_del_mng SELECT BKUP_ID ,#{new_prjt_id} AS PRJT_ID ,GRP_TYCD ,DTLS_TYCD ,DTLS_TYNM ,ETC_TXT1 ,ETC_TXT2 ,ETC_TXT3 ,ETC_TXT4 ,ETC_TXT5 ,ETC_TXT6 ,ETC_TXT7 ,ETC_TXT8 ,ETC_TXT9 ,ETC_TXT10 ,DTL_TXT1 ,DTL_TXT2 ,DTL_TXT3 ,DTL_TXT4 ,DTL_TXT5 ,DTL_TXT6 ,DTL_TXT7 ,DTL_TXT8 ,DTL_TXT9 ,DTL_TXT10 ,SORT_SEQ ,USE_YN ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = '0000000000' AND GRP_TYCD != '0000000000'

INSERT INTO pms_emp_info SELECT BKUP_ID ,#{new_prjt_id} AS PRJT_ID ,EMPNO ,EMPNM ,RANK_NM ,'Admin211111' AS LGN_PWD ,BZCD ,CATN_DCD ,AUT_CD ,REAL_PRJT_ID ,DEPT_CD ,DEL_YN ,INP_DT ,WTH_DT ,#{login_emp_no} /*조작자번호*/ ,DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%s') /*DB변경일시*/ FROM pms_emp_info WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = '0000000000' AND EMPNO = 'Admin'
INSERT INTO pms_holiday_mng SELECT #{new_prjt_id} AS PRJT_ID ,DATE ,DATE_CD ,HOLIDAY_CD FROM pms_holiday_mng WHERE PRJT_ID = '0000000000'

INSERT INTO pms_atfl_mng SELECT BKUP_ID ,#{new_prjt_id} AS PRJT_ID ,ATFL_MNG_ID ,FILE_RGS_DSCD ,SQNO ,FILE_PATH ,FILE_NM ,ORG_FILE_NM ,RMRMK ,OPR_NO ,DB_CHG_TS FROM pms_atfl_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = '0000000000' AND ATFL_MNG_ID = '0000000000' AND FILE_RGS_DSCD IN ('900','901','902')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM pms_cd_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{new_prjt_id}
DELETE FROM pms_cd_del_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{new_prjt_id}
DELETE FROM pms_emp_info WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{new_prjt_id}
DELETE FROM pms_atfl_mng WHERE BKUP_ID = '0000000000' AND PRJT_ID = #{new_prjt_id} AND ATFL_MNG_ID = '0000000000' AND FILE_RGS_DSCD IN ('900','901','902')
